note: 1997 awaiting 8 years in state prison for cannabis I wrote a book to try to save myself . Turns out the Chapter on energy transformation evolved Raw War Against Law without Logic into the book that inspired the Green New Deal . 2009 copy right evacuated 1600 Penn.Ave upon arrival . Obama didn't get it . Mother I think saw urgency . Cannabis freedom saves US from fossils coming back to life to kill US all .
